snippet: The crowd-pleasing Broadway show “Kinky Boots” pulled off an upset victory as best musical at the Tony Awards, edging out the onetime front-runner, “Matilda the Musical.”
abstract: Crowd-pleasing Broadway show Kinky Boots pulls off an upset victory as best musical at the Tony Awards, scoring total of 6 wins in unusually fierce competition against one-time front-runner Matilda the Musical; Christopher Durang comedy Vanya and Sonia and Masha and Spike wins best play; other major Tony Awards winners noted.
lead_paragraph: The crowd-pleasing Broadway show “Kinky Boots” pulled off an upset victory as best musical at the Tony Awards, edging out the onetime front-runner, “Matilda the Musical.”

headline.main: ‘Kinky Boots’ Dances to the Top of the Tonys
headline.print_headline: ‘Kinky Boots’ Dances to the Top of the Tonys
